tutorial: How to Set Up a Community Data Mine

definition.text: This is not a beginning tutorial!

paragraphs.text: Before we get started, this tutorial assumes that you have completed most, if not all, of the welcome tutorials. This tutorial will be confusing if you do not have a basic understanding of how to get around within your workspace. If you have not completed the welcome tutorials. I would suggest that you pause and come back here once you know your way around a little.
If you feel that you are ready, then letâ€™s get started!
